Card Description: What does it mean to get a mission badge? Tap here to know more!
Card Body:
Meaning üéñ


Whenever an RC does something out of the way to give their best, they are rewarded with the Mission Badge.

A mission badge is one of the biggest awards for recognition of hard work and is a commemoration of your efforts.



What is the relevance of a Mission Badge? üèÜ

A mission badge celebrates creators who are putting their all in the fellowship & its mission. This is one way of celebrating such RCs & sending them all the love.



What does it mean to get a mission badge?üèÜ

It means you're on the right path. You over deliver and all you have to do is keep at it.



What do these badges unlock?üéÅ

A certain number of mission badges will unlock special dedicated surprises in the fellowship. More on this very soon!


How many people get mission badges per mission? üî¢

There is no certainty on the number. It depends on the impact of the mission & participation of RCs. Some missions might reward 10 badges while some might not have any.



What if I don't get a mission badge will I not unlock things?üåª


Nothing like that, if a mission had a goal & you met the criteria you will definitely be rewarded. Mission badges are like additional benefits and a flex for exceptional performance.


There are high chances that you might not get it in every mission but have a positive approach & keep at it cause there is a lot left to unlock!


All the best my lovely RC's!üéñ

Brining in game as a campaign was the first creation mission of the Student Creator Fellowship


All of you took participated in your own capacities & it resulted into one of the biggest movement on the internet for the month of January.




I called it & all you brought in A Game! This has resulted into magical things.


  • A lot of top creators in the country have reached out to us asking if they could interact with you all!
  • Too many brands want to collaborate with the RCs after seeing some of your work!


As I type this with a smile on my face we are just getting started team, I really want all of you to know that you are on the right path!üåª



üî¢ Here are some stats that will help you understand the impact in numbers:


üéñDuration of the mission: 7 days


üéñNumber of videos: 707


üéñTotal Reach Of RCs: 2.8Million + views


See all the videos here!


In the coming cards, I will be sharing more highlights from the mission & major takeaways from other RCs too.


With love

Koustubh Kulkarni

For everyone receiving badges! Congratulations üéñ


Mission 04 has a LOTTT of RCs who broke boundaries but here are some of the RCs who really left a mark on the campaign!


Over Power Creators üèÜ

Resident Creators who over delivered by doing the highest number of videos for the Missionüî•



Break Through Videos üèÜ

The Resident Creators who made the most innovative videos with prompts.



Always On Trending üèÜ

Most viral videos of the mission that topped the charts with their engagement.




There are a lot of RCs who have done an incredible job but are not in this list, that doesn't mean you aren't doing a great job. Everyone has their own journey & the fellowship will have tons of more opportunities to grab! So keep the hustle up!


Keep killing it!üéñ

It's super important to reflect on this journey of being a creatorüí´


I don't want you all to just keep hustling without knowing where are you actually headed.


While submitting mission 04 I asked you all for some feedback on it. üìñ

It was completely optional but I was surprised to see that SO many of you all had such great things to share.



Hence I feel all of you should get access to all the learning & feedback, not just meüìá


Click on the links below to read!üóÇ

RCs learnings & takeaways from Mission 04

It's high time all of you start getting to know each other & here's an opportunity for all of you to network with other creators.


Introducing 25 Under 25, an IP that helps you speed network with Me & other RCs‚ù£



What is 25 Under 25?üìç


It's an IP that I'm launching for all of you to connect more & personally I want to spend some more time with you all‚ù§


What's the concept of 25 Under 25?üìá


Every day I will drop a google meet link in the space chat.


Time: It can be anytime & is fully spontaneous.


I will only let in the first 25 RCs in & then we spend 25 minutes together having a no agenda conversation.


What happens in the call?üß´


I share fun insights from the Under 25 Universe & we got to know each other on a deeper level, we can play games & every call will have a topic that will be only revealed for people in the call.


How do we make sure we get in the call?üì°


Keep checking the space chat regularly üôåüèª

You all must be wondering what happens after you fill out your submission form for a mission & when does the unlock come to you? üòç


I will explain this bit with an example of Mission 5 KRACrew üëü


‚úÖ Step 01:


Your mission doesn't end once you upload your videos it ends once you submit them via a google form, the card for the same goes up on the last date of submission.


‚ú¥ Step 02:


Once all the submissions come in, we send it to the brand & they deeply review it or Under 25 does it. Depends on the mission to mission.


This is also the most time-consuming phase of the unlocks.


‚ú≥ Step 03:


Once the review is done then you get a green signal on unlocks & I announce it via cards right them!


üìë Mission 5 Status Report:



The winners are decided & KRA is finishing up with the top 100 Pool now. Once the review is done & I get the final list we shall proceed into unlockingüç≠

Card Body:
SCF Backstage Access


Meaning:üìî


SCF Backstage access gives you insights into how I run the fellowship & what are the different kinds of steps I take to curate the curriculum & sessions for you all.


Who can join the call?üî¶

  1. Residents Creators who are up to date with the fellowship & are willing to take more responsibility.
  2. Resident Creators who actively take part in the missions, collaborative IPs & Creator Academy Sessions.


How can we get more leadership opportunities? üïØ


On today's call, I shall give you all a brief on how to go about the same.


What you need to know is that only join the call if you REALLY have the time & want to do more than just being a resident creator.


What are some examples of leadership opportunities? üîé


Creator Advisory Board (CAB) at SCF üî∑

  • Be the voice of student creators & map down how can we empower student creators across disciplines.


Moderator at SCF üß†

  • Work alongside me to program the fellowship & get posting access on SCF Space.


Director at Creator Academy. üé¨

  • Programming Creator Academy & understating the in's & out of curation at Under 25.


Working alongside Space Admins: üîñ

  • Represent SCF on the highest level.
  • Strategizing content & campaigns for the entire Under 25 Universe & working hands-on with the artists of Under 25.


How many people will be shortlisted? üó≥

Depending on how many good candidates I get, there is no cap. It fully depends on how far does one push the game.


These are some basic pointers you can keep in mind before joining today's call & the next steps shall be covered in the callüíØ

About the industry üè≠

Fashion brands can be hard to work with. But working with brands that push fashion as a genre is harder to work with.

In this campaign with Roposo, I have truly lived to see what happens on the other side of the book as wellü•µ


Off the record üìπ

Seeing your ideas, and the initiatives you've taken to shoot content has truly been glorifying and humbles me to realize how underrated an RC's creativity can be.


In your pursuit of becoming discoverable, I've also seen RC's going out of the way to support, promote and push a fellow RC's content on their own which makes me believe more in our SCF Family.üíñ


Brands 101 üê©

With such unique and creative storytelling, brands only realize what they have been missing out on. Truly engaging content that their pages would otherwise never receive.


Creation at the core, now I can say RCs of course have understood:

  1. What works for a brand.
  2. What doesn't.
  3. What the underlying theme is.
  4. How content should be put out.
  5. What necessary context needs to be given.
  6. How to amplify ongoing campaigns.
  7. Communication and formats.
  8. Monetization.


Opportunity ü•è

In our lingo, we say sky is the limit, but this campaign I see our limits be pushed and penetrated everyday! üöÄ


Onwards and Upwards RC's, cannot wait to you break every threshold possible for your 2nd reel for Roposo & in the month of April! Aaaand get richer ofcourse! ü§©

An important task or a set of tasks is given to an individual or a group of people typically during a course of a journey.

About the brand messaging:üìª

In an effort to dedicate itself to a greater purpose, Gillette India developed #ShavingStereotypes ‚Äì a platform celebrating examples of positive change.


The work under this banner features real stories of people who have challenged and redefined outdated stereotypes in society.


Example:

  • Gillette Shaving Stereotypes - Barbershop Girls of India: https://youtu.be/QCR24jyhfZk
  • Gillette Shaving Stereotypes - Man Enough: https://youtu.be/uGUC0YSmrH8


Brief:üîå


Similarly, the upcoming iteration of this platform tackles a stereotype that‚Äôs strongly prevalent in society today ‚Äì the rigid mould for success imposed on young students and graduates.


It makes a thoughtful commentary on how such inflexible definitions stifle our potential and purpose, almost creating an assembly line of identical achievers.


Whom do they need?üé∏

Musicians!


The musicians should be able to sing and/or be able to play any kind of instrument. It can be in any kind of musician:

  • Singer
  • Instrumentalist
  • Brand
  • Choir
  • Composer/ Producers


Tentative Timelines for the recoding? ‚è∞

  • They are tentatively planning on recording this sometime in the first or second week of April.


Preferred Musician according to the brand:üèÅ

  • Students Studying Engineering
  • Musicians Located in Mumbai, Pune or Nagpur

#100/100

Resident Creators, you've gained my trust.


Going forward I would like to open gates & pass on the baton to some people who want to take up an opportunity.


The opportunity to empower Student Creators across disciplines & build a generation of content creators. I've been on this journey for quite some time & I always feel like there is so much more than I can do.


Introducing CABüèØ



Creators Advisory Board üèØ

A set of 15 Resident Creators that will be directly working with me to build the Student Creator Fellowship. They will be a team that enables Information, Access & experiences for the Student Creator Fellowship alongside me.


Roles & Responsibilities for grabs:




Roll out important information to all RCs, build culture in calls & help everyone to catch up to speed. Also, work on shortlisting RCs & SCF onboarding. This role will teach you a lot about leadership & how to interact with people.


üìÆIntake: 5 Spots


Gain posting access on the SCF Space & become moderators. Journal & document everything SCF. From the minutes of the meeting to the end of campaign reports, learn how to present information to brands & break all kinds of information.


üìÆIntake: 5 Spots


Everything Design! Learn about the Under 25 Design language. Design Decks, Cards, & Proposals for SCF. Apply only if you are good with Photoshop/ Illustrator.


üìÆIntake: 3 Spots


Build SCF as a brand & find ways to make RCs more discoverable to the entire world. From making collaborations happen on Under 25 Media pages to finding ways for RCs to take part in missions.


üìÆIntake: 2 Spots


The Video Editor at SCF gets to make films for the space & add visual elements to cards. If you are a pro in the editing game, this is for you.


üìÆIntake: 1 Spot



More About CAB üèØ


üìçThis is the first set of board members. Every month we'll have a new set of board members getting the opportunity to learn alongside us.


üìçRemember, this is only for the RCs who want to do more than usual & it's not gonna be easy. It's hard work, discipline & insane amount of effort.


üìçOnly apply if you are hungry enough for an opportunity

Hitarth Dadia, Chief Marketing Officer at NOFILTR.Group



Hitarth Dadia presently chairs the position of a Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) at NOFILTR.Group. His role involves optimizing business collaborations and creating a profitable entrepreneurial blueprint for the influencers collaborating with NOFILTR.Group.


More about Nofiltr.Group

Hitarth's LinkedIn

Hitarth's Instagram


üíµ While driving profits in the company remains a mainstay, Hitarth works closely with the creative departments and plays an instrumental role in charting out the detailed insights in public relations and branding for the influencers.


üß† Armed with foresight and a market-savvy streak, Hitarth invests in a dint of hard work, giving NOFILTR.Group the edge it has today.


Journey


Hitarth joined NOFILTR.Group as a Sales intern and advanced onwards into essaying the role of a business development head before taking over as the CMO.


ü™ô Hitarth's accomplishments at NOFILTR.Group involve fruitful collaborations with international brands of repute. Some of these brands include Cadbury and Amazon Pay.


While working with these brands Hitarth creatively coupled his insight in Sales and marketing to garner the required traction for these brands on Group media.


Schooling üéì

  • Born and brought up in Mumbai, Hitarth received education from a prominent convent school. Being an introvert Hitarth, later slipped into his comfort zone during his years at Somaiya College.
  • Soon after, he graduated in Banking and Insurance from Mithibai College in Mumbai, where he experienced a monumental personality shift for the positive.


What he did do before he joined No Filtr?

Hitarth worked at a multinational bank for a year to gain experience in the banking industry. Creativity took a back seat while working at the bank, but the experience helped him garner insight into the organizational hierarchy and structure.


‚ú¥ Paths Found


  • Popular Campaigns Executed under Hitarth's leadership are Amazon Great Indian Sale, Snapchat, Netflix and Switzerland Tourism.



After working with top brands & top creators of the country he is coming to teach all of us about the legalities of this world.

Welcome to the first Mega Mission of the student creator fellowship! üöÄ


Here's why a mega mission is different from a regular mission.

  1. It's something that the entire fellowship takes part in and is not an optional one.
  2. The unlocks are larger than life
  3. The duration of the mission is beyond just 7 days.

Mission Brief



Streaksüî•

  • Starting from the 23rd of April Saturday, we will be getting into posting cards daily for the next 30 daysüèÅ
  • This is an Under 25 Mission & it will be your final chance to land a spot in under 25 original creators üíØ
  • The Unlocks are massive! & yess you heard it right top 25 of you all are going to be flown down to Bombay for the launch of the Under 25 App üõ©


What do we start posting?

  • 23rd April will be day 1 of the streaks & including today & tomorrow I will give you more details on the mega mission.


What can we do now?


üé≤ Strategize your cards

There are over 5 formats for postcards, so start trying out all the formats & see which formats work for what type of content.


üìöContent Calendar

As we are fighting for consistency, planning helps to make this process smoother. Plan 100 different types of cards that you would want to do & start building your repository.


üìÆ Post 5 cards to prototypes

In the next 2 days get a hang of posting cards. So once you start your streaks then you will be very comfortable in publishing as many cards as you'd like.


üå† Quality Check

Know that quality cards are the biggest parameter for the unlock. To find out interesting topics to talk about & get the ball rolling


Coming up next for Mega Mission

  • Streak Guidebook
  • Posting timing details & Hashtags
  • Quality parameters
  • Content buckets
  • Full list of Unlocks
  • Original Creators Special


Start prepping as this is about to go down as the craziest mission in SCFüî•

What part of this excites you the most? Let me know in the comments!

This man needs no introduction!


Tomorrow that is the 22nd of April at 7 PM. BLOCK YOUR CALENDARS!



The person who wrote and sang cold/mess, praised by Barack Obama, and the person who performed Karwaan, the one, and only Prateek Kauhad!



His Journey üé∂

He‚Äôs a singer from Jaipur, who‚Äôs spent over a decade writing, singing, and performing songs, carving out a unique role for himself in the music industry.



He found his love for music when he began playing the g guitar as a teenager and listened to his parents‚Äô Cliff Richard and sister‚Äôs Backstreet Boys CDs.


His journey started when he moved to New York to attend college, where he began to blossom as a musician, playing local shows around the city in the early ‚Äò10s. The rest is history!




Appreciated more than 1.9 million people every month on Spotify, the singer has also curated an album for the Netflix original series - Mismatch, which ironically was the perfect match for us!


What's your Favourite PK song? Drop words from the song in the comments & let others complete it ü§≠

Back Story!


2 weeks ago, I thought of changing the game & switching up how SCF operates by giving some of the Resident Creators to work alongside me at the Creators Advisory Board (CAB) & work hands on towards building the next generation of content creators.



After rounds of screening and going through over 100+ applicants, I finally have the first set of our board members!



All the RCs who applied for the roles were exceptional. This convinced me to take in 4 more board members, in addition to the 15 I had planned on & increase the intake from 15 to 19.


Verdict üöÄ

Presenting to you the CAB, where each and every RC is a champ in their own way. They are some OGs who will be taking the Student creator fellowship alongside me, enabling Information, Access & Experiences for all of us!


Presenting the Boards! üèØ


1. Community Board üåª

  • The members of this board will actively communicate, provide opportunities, and bring new learnings to the Resident Creators.



2. Editorial Board ‚úí

  • You don't have to worry about missing out when you've got the Editorial Board. They're here to give you a thorough breakdown of the craziness happening at the SCF.



3. Creative Board üîç

  • Can't navigate your way through the app? This board has your back covered. They'll be designing EVERYTHING from roadmaps to decks in order to help you out.



4. Video Editing Board üé¨

  • We've all seen the insane videos of the Academy sessions and the kick off. Well, things are about to get more insane with these new members.



5. Brands Board üí°

  • Like Aman Gupta of Boat, we like to build brands. The sole purpose of this board is to build the brand of the Student Creator Fellowship.



These were the board members! Congratulations team & for everyone who applied, just want to say that we will be taking on new members every month! This is just the beginning üíØ


Send in all the love to our first batch of CAB in the comments & let's support them together ‚ù§

7 PM we witness the magic of Prateek Kuhad!


The hype is real! Loving all the audition cards & let's have a ball of a time today with Space Warriors ‚ù§


Advisory Board Member in Frame: Siddesh Parab


Also don't forget to wear RED! üçí

Drop in a red emoji in the comments if you are gonna be thereüå¨

Card Description: The game has changed! Welcome to 30 days of MEGA üî•üî•üî•
Card Body:
Mega Mission 01: Battle Out Consistency ‚ö°



üî• Mega mission is a trial round to be part of Under 25 Original Creators. You will be going on a journey for the next 30 days & we'll be dropping exciting twists in between.


üî• However, remember this is a mission that will trigger your creative senses on daily basis, so go all out & make this one count!



To unlock the 30 Days streak grant you will not just have to finish 30 cards in 30 days.


10 K grants will be given to people who have 10 quality badges and a 30 day streak.



Collect your 10 Quality Badges! üíé

Badged will be distributed every 7 days



  • Make entertaining college content via videos
  • Driving Value & drawing insights.
  • Sharing real-life experiences & killer storytelling
  • Making the dopest video cards
  • Having top-notch design
  • Driving engagement with cards



‚è∞ As SCF we will be following a certain timeline to make sure all cards get enough reach & screen time.


‚è∞ It's preferred if you post during these times but you can post anytime too!


You can post your streak on any 1 of the 3 timelines:

  • Slot 01: 9 AM - 11 AM
  • Slot 02: 2 PM - 4 PM
  • Slot 03: 9 PM - 11 PM



We use two hashtags 2Ô∏è‚É£

You can use these hashtags in headings, blurbs, thumbnails & descriptions.


1. Depending on the day of the streak! üìÜ

Examples:

Day 1 - #01/30

Day 2 - #02/30

Day 3 - #03/30


2. #StudentCreatorFellowship


üåà Coming up soon...



Unlock Level 01 Comes out 26th of April ‚ö°

All the best RCs! We start posting at 9 AM!

We have officially flagged off with the Mega Mission!üèÅ


Day 1is critical as it will be the start of your 30 days & if you miss out today then it'll be not easy to catch up.


‚úÖ Hygiene checklist


  • Make sure you always post in a slot that is mentioned in the mission card.
  • Double-check hashtags & make them evidently visible.
  • Don't stop at 1 card a day. Don't forget the mission is about landing Quality badges & not just completing the streaks.


üìëAlso, you make a small tracker where you have a record of all your cards.

In case we miss out on any, you should be in a place where you can always back your work! An Excel sheet with date, time & card link is the way I would go about it if I had to keep track of my cards!


Did you already post your first supercritical? Let me know in the comments section!üî•

Even before the Mega Mission Started there were a lot of RCs who started playing their cards üóÉ


These Resident Creators have the most number of cards to their tallyüìä


Don't get me wrong this is not a leaderboard, this is the number of reps they have on this playing field, confused? Let me explain what this means


First I'll break down what a rep means ü•ä



Dictionary meaning


Repetitions in strength training, also known as resistance training or weightlifting, reps are the number of times you complete a single exercise before taking a rest or a break.


Short for ‚Äúrepetitions,‚Äù reps help you keep track of your strength workout.


How do we look at it as Under 25?

Just like in you do reps in a gym you can do reps of anything in life. The only takeaway from this is that the more reps you have of something the better you tend to be in that ‚õ≥


Following are the Resident Creators who have done the most amount of reps in posting cards so far! ü•ã




P.S. This count has nothing to do with the Mega mission & its unlocküïπ


Everyone has an equal chance at landing the unlock but to earn quality badges you will have to understand the game to a deeper level. The only way to do that is by doing as many reps as possible ü•ä


Tell me in the comments how many reps are you planning to do in the next 3 days? üéØ

Card Title: What's the best time to post?
Card Description: All about slot timings of Mega mission & which slot is the best for youüî∫
Card Body:
There are a total of 3 Slots for Mega Mission üî∫


Slot 01: 9 AM - 11- AM üòá


üÉè Card frequency - Low

üì¢ Engagement level - Moderate

üé∞ Time on universe feed - High


  • This is an early morning slot & is for people who post multiple cards in a day üåª
  • Here your card gets enough to feed time & they will get good traction till lunchtime.




Slot 2: 2 PM - 4 PM ü§ë


üÉè Card frequency - Moderate

üì¢ Engagement level - High

üé∞ Time on universe feed - Moderate


  • Here is where the majority of the explorers start tuning into the app as colleges get over & people to look for updates from their fellowships & spaces
  • You can start building momentum here & this slot has a good amount of video cards usually.



Slot 3: 9 PM - 11 PM ü§Ø


üÉè Card frequency - Mega

üì¢ Engagement level - Moderate

üé∞ Time on universe feed - Low


  • This is the mega slot of the mega mission. We see double the amount of cards in this slot.
  • Yesterday slot 3 alone had over 100 cards.
  • You get to see final drops of the RCs who built hype for their drops & image cards + videos cards get a lot of traction here.



Slots are important as they give all your cards enough time on the universe feed & quality badges are only given to those cards üéØ


Which slots do you prefer posting in? Let me in the comments section!

As of now, 26 Quality badges have been assigned. You'll get the list on the weekend!

Keep experimenting & let ke know what type of cards you all want to see about the Mega Mission? üéØ

About Naser üåª

This man is an all rounder: a dancer, a songwriter, a filmmaker/actor, and a YouTuber. He is currently the Emcee and Founder of Black Ice Crew; a Dance group.



Naser is also known for starting an Indian Comedy Sketch Youtube Channel named ‚ÄúJordindian‚Äù along with his friend Vineeth ‚ÄúBeep‚Äù Kumar. The duo has 2.5+ Million subscribers!



As crazy as it sounds, Naser started his journey with a purpose to prove himself right and others wrong. When you‚Äôre determined, you can reach crazy heights.


When Naser went Viral ü§Ø

Things took an interesting turn in 2016 when Naser met Beep, and formed ‚ÄúJordindian‚Äù; Jordan + Indian.



Smoke Shisha Play FIFA became a viral sensation in 2018 when the video crossed over 18 Million views. This led Naser and Beep to drop more bangers for their audience, they kept levelling up, focusing on more quality content.


The duo has been creating content primarily focused on Comedy sketches based on youth culture in India and the differences between their respective cultures.

üïπPre Unlock Meaning:

üéìIntroducing the Big Bang Social Academy!



üéìWhat Is BigBang.Social Academy?


  • It is your next go-to place for exploring everything about Content Creation.
  • You‚Äôre going to get India‚Äôs Top Creators and Brands that will mentor you in order to help you gain insights and become the best version of yourself.

üéìWhat‚Äôs the Unlock?

You will get access to 2 courses wherein you‚Äôll be mentored by Mrunal Panchal in one, and Varun Agrawal and Ritik Mahajan in the other.

Card Description: Zebpay is here! The biggest monetary unlock is yet! üíµ
Card Body:
Zebpay is a trusted and secure crypto exchange with a wallet that serves customers across the globe. Zebpay is available on the Web, Android, and iOS for trading bitcoin, ether, ripple, and various other popular cryptocurrencies.



With a focus on spreading awareness towards Zebpay as a crypto exchange and a platform for knowledge about cryptocurrency, the intent of the student creators is to showcase Zebpay as the platfor to start their investment journey on the app.


üí≥ Meaning


In this RCs will tell a story according to their genres and based on their identity, promote Zebpay and installing the Zebpay app.


  • You should be a minimum of 18 years of age.
  • Completed Mission 3 & Filled Final Acceptance form.



  • Only 60 Creators will be shortlisted for this mission.
  • Selection will be done on your application, following, genre and activity.
  • Fill the form below to take part in this mission!

Apply here



  1. You have to be above 18 to be a part of this mission.
  2. You need to create 2 reels each üì§
  3. DONOT include the paid partnership option. Zebpay specifically does not want that üíπ
  4. As a Creator you cannot and will not speak of Zebpay that could hamper its image in any manner üíº
  5. Creators can get an opportunity to collab on Zebpay‚Äôs page if they clear the criteria such as no political affluence, no profanity and have a good following üìù
  6. While making content do not imply that investing in crypto has made you rich üïØ
  7. Do not upload any reel without getting approval from the organizing team üèÅ



  1. Ask a question about crypto as person 1 and break down crypto as person 2 in your natural way, then talk about how you can invest in crypto on the Zebpay App.
  2. Tell how you initially too did not get crypto, and how by reading up about it on Zebpay helped you understand what it is and now you‚Äôve begun investing in it.
  3. Provide information by providing basic facts you learned about crypto and end with how everyone can start their investment journey now on the Zebpay App.
  4. "Boyfriends and girlfriends will come and go but crypto is for life" can be a narrative you can use.
  5. Plan for 18th birthday - Y‚Äôall can talk about what you would want to do with your Birthday money or how you would like to start your investment journey




  1. All 60 RCs need to upload their videos in a google drive link.
  2. This link needs to be open and accessible to everyone who has this link.
  3. A specific google sheet will be shared with you all, where you will have to add the drive link there.
  4. The Zebpay team will be viewing your content and approving it in real-time.
  5. Once they have viewed your video, and approved then only will you be allowed to post it on Instagram.

Remember:

This campaign is anchored toward creative storytelling that gives you as a student creator the freedom to excel in your niche and promote Zebpay and installing the Zebpay app.

üìç Dhruv Sheth, changing the live and content industry, aims to bring in new and exciting regional content and content formats to the audiences.


Dhruv's LinkedIn

Dhruv's Instagram



üî∏About Dhruv


He started his career as an intern in OML. From there, he became the finance controller, head of marketing and ticketing, head of talent management, and is currently the Chief Operating Officer.


From being a production intern for the David Guetta concerts, he went ahead with Comicstaan, One Mic Stand, and Laakhon main Ek.


üî∏His journey with OML


OML (Only Much Louder)



OML plays in the intersection of creators, communities, and brands. It partners with creators and storytellers to develop and create content and event experiences that appeal to today‚Äôs digital audience.


Dhruv has been a part of the OML family for more than 10 years, from starting out as a financial controller to being its COO today.


üî∏Paths Found

  • Dhruv worked as a Talent Acquisition Manager and he also oversees the content division, the integrated creator, and the artist management team.
  • He has quite an eye for talent which is evident as he has expanded OML to 75 artists from just 17 artists.
  • He was the one who acquired Zakir khan & Signed him with oml.


üî∏Dhruv's previous projects


These are some shows that have been Conceptualized by him!

  • AIB‚Äôs Knockout
  • Comicstaan
  • One Mic Stand
  • Laakhon Mein Ek
  • Chacha Vidhayak Hai Humare



üî∫ At the creator Academy!


After having a decade of experience with building creators as a brand & forming an empire for them, He is now coming at the Academy to bring in his expertise of building a business in the creative industry!


Fire up the comments with all your questions! And I'll pick some of them & ask Dhruv tomorrow! üí•

The most awaiting unlock results are hereüî∫


üíµ Here's the unlock structure for everyone once again!





Top 50


‚ùìHow will you get the unlocks?


If you've filled your account details in the logbook then you are good to go! The payment shall be initiated by the end of this month.


* Timings are subject to change as per the brand calendar & you shall be updated if there is any delay *



üìçIf you failed to fill in your details in the logbook then you won't be eligible for the unlock.


Congratulations to all 50 creators! Keep slamming it & onto the next one üöÄ

Content-Preneur


üî∏In layman's terms, it is someone who treats content creation as it their full-time business eventually. An entrepreneur takes a creative idea and turning it into a business opportunity.


üî∏An entrepreneur that prioritizes content in their strategy can be called a content-preneur.


1. Tanmay Bhat


He is possibly one of the finest comedians India has. Along with that, he is a scriptwriter & producer.



  • He currently hosts ‚ÄòHonestly by Tanmay Bhat‚Äô on YouTube, disseminating financial knowledge in a fun and consumable way.
  • He is also the Co-Founder of Superteam which is a podcast that explores the web3 ecosystem in India.

Net Worth - $2.22 -$4 million


2. Bhuvan Bam


The Undisputed King of Youtube, with a massive following of over 25 million subscribers on YouTube, 14.3 million on Instagram, 4.7 million on Facebook, and 3.9 million on Twitter.



  • He launched his own merchandise-based store Youthiapa, along with his friend, Arvin Bhandari.
  • He started his own BB Ki Vine Production House, releasing Titu Talks and his first-ever web-show Dhindora. It went on to becoming India‚Äôs most-watched show on youtube with 400 Million views and counting.
  • He starred in a short film, Plus Minus which earned him a Filmfare award.

Net worth - $3 -$3.5 million


3. Pewdie Pie


The world's top YouTube star, Swedish gaming streamer PewDiePie. The 32-year-old has a huge online following, with 111 million subscribers on YouTube.




  • PewDiePie is in a paid partnership with Gfuel energy drink. He features Gfuel in some of his videos and sometimes mentions the drink to his audience.
  • Read more about the endorsement

Net worth - $20 million


4. Logan Paul


He is a pure content-prenuer as he started his social Media career in 2013 by making videos on Vine. He later grew his following on various platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube as well.




This, in turn, lead him to make a new YouTube channel named Logan Paul Vlogs which is today the 74th most-subscribed channel in the United States, and all of this following by his own clothing brand MAVERICK, which is also a great revenue-generating business from him.



  • IMPAULSIVE - He is running this podcast since 2019 alongside his friends.
  • PRIME Hydration - This is the energy drink company that is a joint business venture by him and fellow Youtuber KSI.
  • LIQUID Marketplace: Logan‚Äôs newest Business venture, is a blockchain company. A platform where collectors can buy and sell fractions of rare collectibles via tokens on the blockchain.


Net worth - $35 million



Who is your favourite entrepreneur out of the above lot?

Let everyone know in the comments! & see you all in 4 hours üöÄ

üöÄ From breaking down how important authenticity is, to talking about how content-preneurs build a legacy.


üî∏Personally I was having so much fun with listening to all his stories as I feel we have grown up watching AIB & OML transform the creative industry


üî∏Felt like a whole circle as we got to know how did all of this come to live



üîÖHere were our favourite quotes from the session:

  • In my head, I‚Äôm 19 and 20 only.
  • A content-preneur looks to build a legacy over money.
  • Somebody keep a count of how many times I say authenticity.
  • The currency is energy. Create it.
  • There is no right time to managing yourself, you‚Äôre already doing that.
  • Authenticty. Authenticity. Authenticity.



All thanks to Dhruv for reminding us how significant it is to be authentic in a natural way‚ù§


Drop in all the love for him in the comments & what was your biggest take away!

üîÖAbout Vijay


Vijay Subramaniam is the Founder and Group CEO of The Collective Artists Network. He aims to help both aspiring and well-established creators by showcasing and monetizing their talent.



Vijay‚Äôs Instagram

Vijay‚Äôs LinkedIn



üîÖPaths found by Vijay


  • Collective Artists Network

Collective artists network, formerly known as Kwan, is the largest talent agency in India. It is a multi-faceted content powerhouse with unparalleled access to India‚Äôs leading talent across categories.



It straddles the entertainment industry with around 150 clients ‚Äî Top movie stars, Directors, Writers and other professionals. Befitting its multi-faceted role, the company is an Entertainment Marketplace, not just a talent agency.


üîÖHis recent project


  • Collective Artists Network‚Äôs BigBang.Social Academy:

Vijay aims to provide creators to have the opportunity to monetise and show their skills by using Collective Artists Network‚Äôs relationships with creator platforms and corporate India.



  • Music

Sony Music and KWAN announced a strategic 50-50 joint venture to launch a new-age pop label, Big Bang Music. It leverages Sony Music‚Äôs expertise in the music business & global reach and KWAN‚Äôs leadership in artist management and relationships with talent, brands, and promoters.



üîÖTalent Management


The Talent Agency Collective Artist Network‚Äôs rosters of celebrities include Deepika Padukone, Ranbir Kapoor, Tiger Shroff, Sara Ali Khan, and cricketer Ravichandran Ashwin & more


üîÖVijay‚Äôs Routine


  • Vijay, an energy-driven person has had a long relationship with fitness.
  • When Vijay started out as an Entrepreneur, he prioritized establishing the company. Things do take a lot of time when you‚Äôre starting something new. One is involved day and night into one‚Äôs work.
  • However, being self-aware was the key for Vijay!üóùÔ∏è He soon acknowledged that his health condition needs to be improved upon and made working out a ‚ÄúNon-negotiable‚Äù!


Quoting Vijay, ‚ÄúJust buy yourself enough time to resurrect your body before it breaks‚Äù.

Fun fact he's also a great...

Who knew Vijay would build such a safe space for the Resident Creators, wherein he‚Äôd share insights on content creation, monetization, management, and what not!



As someone who holds a similar purpose in life for helping creators reach the greatest heights, the man was more than just inspiring!



Some of crowd's favourite quotes from the sessions have to beüöè:

About Rohit


Rohit, India‚Äôs Youngest Event manager, India‚Äôs Youngest Artist Manager and a Hotelier, is the co-founder and CEO at BB Ki Vines Productions as well as the co-founder of Artist Aadmi.



He is the man behind Bhuvan‚Äôs success who has not only turned Bhuvan‚Äôs content into business but also made Bhuvan Bam a brand.



He aims to see the creator economy skyrocket and it to be the first source of entertainment for the world


Rohit‚Äôs Instagram

Rohit‚Äôs LinkedIn



Paths found by Rohit

üîÖArtist Aadmi

Artist Aadmi is a boutique talent management representing a bouquet of bands, DJs, singers, rappers and more. They work towards matching event needs with the talent of their artists with an aim of putting up an entertaining event for their guests.



üîÖ Rohit Raj events

Founded his first-ever company focusing on event management in 2012. The company manages events such as college festivals, wedding functions, live shows and corporate events. Managed events like sunburn campus at IIT Kanpur, a destination wedding for the Kent RO family and worked on the ICC world cup official anthem in 2015 to name a few.


Rohit‚Äôs Journey


üîÖArtist Aadmi talent wins India's got talent


Artist Aadmi represents India‚Äôs first folk beatboxer who is also India‚Äôs Got Talent 2022 winner-Divyansh Kacholia. Their exclusive artists‚Äô roster includes Bhuvan Bam, Mohit Gaur, Alpatva band, Mohit Gaur, Ankit Kholia, and a band- Agastya, among others.


üîÖWith Bhuvan Bam


From prompting Bhuvan to start a youtube channel called BB ki vines after his first viral video to launching Bhuvan's song and winning the Filmfare award for Plus Minus he has not just been a manager but a friend to Bhuvan.




As a producer


üîÖPlus Minus

He has also co-produced Bhuvan Bam's short film 'Plus Minus' along with Oscar-winning Guneet Monga which won the 'Best Short Film Award ‚Äì Popular Choice at Filmfare Awards 2019. He has been an executive producer for songs like- Safar, Sang Hoon Tere, Rahguzar, Bas Mein and the forthcoming project Ajnabee.




üîÖDhindora

Further, he has produced India‚Äôs first creator led show for YouTube called Dhindora which has garnered more than 400 Million views under the banner of BB Ki Vines Production.




üîÖTaaza Khabar

Currently working and taking BBKV Productions a notch above, he is producing his next show ‚ÄòTaaza Khabar‚Äô for an OTT platform, ‚ÄòChai Coffee‚Äô for Amazon MiniTV along with 2 feature films in the pipeline.




Boost U


Apart from this, he is also the digital head at Boost U‚Äì a digital marketing venture.


With technology taking over the common man's life and social media becoming the quintessential platform to reach out to the world, his start-up called Boost √õ has come into existence with the single point focus of catering to products and brands so as to enhance their social media presence.



üî∫ Rohit at academy

Let's make this card a repository of all the mad things that we can do offline!

üìå Under 25 - Play Your Cards



Under 25 Universe is going public on 25th of June. This is where we will be announcing all the matters and whatever we are about. Along with this, we shall also be launching the new version of the App. As a part of the lead-up to the launch, we plan to do a lot of student-led activations that create a buzz around the massive launch.


Brief

A student need to pick a cause and can activate an experience based on it. The 7 Causes are :


üìñ Learning

Awareness-Education-Literacy


‚öñEquality

Justice-Systems-Rights


üåçEnvironment

Sustainability-Climate Change-Awareness


‚ù§Love

Kindness-Charity-Upliftment


üîÖWell-Being

Mental Health-Acceptance-Fitness


üí°Empowerment

Voice-Local-Upliftment


üíéIdentity

Lifestyle-Originality-Community


What you need to do?

  1. Activate experiences of your choice & film an after movie for the same that'll go up on Under 25 Official.
  2. Bring on Under 25 as a collaborator to existing events that are planned in your college from now until 25th June.
  3. Follow Guidelines pre, during and post experience and share the outcome report
  4. Don‚Äôt miss out on College, College Hangout Areas while you are also focusing on public places
  5. Document everything to T while you are having fun building it


# Guideline for live experiences

  1. The Under 25 Experience hosted by you shall be drug-free, smoke-free and alcohol-free
  2. People of all ages shall be allowed to enter as long as they have a valid ticket / names on the RSVP/ Guest list
  3. Students should share how they are planning the brand placements with team Under 25 before-hand
  4. You should have a photographer and videographer to cover the experience that you are curating
  5. The format of the Experience must be discussed with the Under 25 Experience team before-hand
  6. If your event has an MC or Host, make it a point that the Under 25 - Play Your Cards launching on June 25th is mentioned multiple times


Apply here


Post selection you'll have a briefing call with the Project team & Me for more understanding on timeliness.

Ask all your doubts in the comments! üì£


Word from KKüåª

This is not as hard as it looks. All of you are creators & you just have to find ways to have fun & record those moments.

In 14 days we did over 5 pre events & ended with a sold-out summit. I'm not telling you this because it's a big deal. I'm telling you this because the those were the days when I learnt the most & formed connection for life‚ù§


If I could do it, so can you.

Creators Advisory Board üèØ



A set of Resident Creators that will be directly working with me to build the Student Creator Fellowship. They will be a team that enables Information, Access & Experiences for the Student Creator Fellowship alongside me.


Roles & Responsibilities for grabs:



Roll out important information to all RCs, build a culture in calls & help everyone to catch up to speed. Also, work on shortlisting RCs & SCF onboarding. This role will teach you a lot about leadership & how to interact with people.

üìÆIntake: 5 Spots



Gain posting access on the SCF Space & become moderators. Journal & document everything SCF. From the minutes of the meeting to the end of campaign reports, learn how to present information to brands & break all kinds of information.

üìÆIntake: 7 Spots



Everything Design! Learn about the Under 25 Design language. Design Decks, Cards, & Proposals for SCF. Apply only if you are good with Photoshop/ Illustrator.

üìÆIntake: 3 Spots



Build solutions for brands & SCF & find ways to make RCs more discoverable to the entire world. From making collaborations happen on Under 25 Media pages to finding ways for RCs to take part in missions.

üìÆIntake: 2 Spots


More About CAB üèØ


üìçThis first batch of CAB members will have a chance to be retained on the bases of their performance & the number of missions they completed.


üìçRemember, this is only for the RCs who want to do more than usual & it's not gonna be easy. It's hard work, discipline & insane amount of effort.


üìçOnly apply if you are hungry enough for an opportunity

Card Description: 100 Slots & 23 days! We do the first mid mission unlock for? Click here!üèÅ
Card Body:
Green Yodha is a sustainability initiative by Schneider Electric that aims to build a community of conscious citizens, businesses, and institutions to unite for a collective action towards the adoption of practices in energy efficiency, renewables and solar, automation, digitalization, and a new world of electricity to meet both individual and corporate sustainability goalsüèû



  1. Do 1 reel & 1 story with their filter
  2. You need to create awareness about the brand.
  3. Showcase how you are a #GreenYodha and how you protect and save the environment.
  4. Exhibit the small, everyday sustainable efforts you doüåè



The government decides on a particular aggregate of resources to be used for a whole year. However this year the resources got exhausted before the year ended and this is marked as earth overshoot dayüåê


Why Did Earth Overshoot Day Happen Almost One Month Earlier in 2021?



  1. The timeline for the following mission is 20th July to 20th August‚è∞
  2. Those posting between 24th to 30th July should shed light upon this day on their reelsüóì
  3. This is a limited intake mission. 100 creators.
  4. Each creator needs to make 1 reel each and 1 story repost & using a filterüé≠


Reel - Dont use the filter

Story - Only use the filter




You all can post on LinkedIn as a part of this mission for brownie points! üöÄ


Content for linkedIn




  • Running up the stairs instead of waiting for a lift: We could make this a challenge and see who reaches faster.üîã
  • Using cycles over regular transport¬†and seeing who is not tired at the end.üöâ
  • How long can someone go without charging any of their electronic devices?üì≤



  • Using more public transportüöè
  • Increasing your daily steps by walking close distancesüèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
  • Cutting out processed food for a weeküéÇ
  • Always check the lights and appliances before leaving homeüñ•
  • Collectively watching shows/sporting events on one screenüïπ



  • Choosing to road trip to nearby states rather than take a flightüõ£
  • Going plant-based for a week üåø(with proper research)
  • Carpooling with friends to a college/outingsüöô



  • Talk and make people aware of the earth's overshoot day ‚úÖ
  • Investing in an electric scooter/cycleüö≤
  • Increasing your set AC temperature by 2 degrees üå°
  • Switching to home automation as it reduces 20% off your electric bills üîå



  • You have to do 1 reel & 1 story using the filter to be eligible for the unlockü§≥üèΩ
  • Please make sure to keep the screenshot of the story after 24 hours to update states in submission üö®
  • The Reel has to be a minimum of 12 seconds
  • The posting starts on 22nd July and the last date to post is 20th August.
  • The minute we hit 100 entries for the mission we stop the mission üöß

Card Body:
The boys are back! üõπ



Let's think out of the box lift & have a good time today! üå≥

See you all at 9:30!


Drop 1 doubt in the comment that you can come up with before the storm üå™

It's gonna happen anytime now!


The Universe is ready to celebrate SCF, are you ready?


Until we hit 100k drop a card stating your top SCF moment & let's all look back at this wonderful journey ‚ù§

The one question that everyone has been asking me for the past week is "Koustubh, how does it feel"?


Here's my answer:

I didn't cry, I didn't feel like I'm on top of the world, I smiled, like I do.


In January 2022, a lot happened. I was learning, growing, and accepting all at once. In the midst of this, I was also sharing a poster with people I idolised as a student and we kicked off SCF. You should know this, I call SCF my passion project.


I've always wanted to build something of my own & this time I was so freaking ready. I had done enough reps, all the homework & knew exactly how to take things to another level entirely. I was in the goddamn zone 24/7 when I laid down the foundation for SCF.


Fun fact you'd already know if you've worked with me closely: I'm extremely ambitious and can't settle for anything but the best, and I knew this would be it.

100k was just one of my 100k dreams for SCF.




I remember at 50,000, it hit hard and at 75,000 I was like damn it's happening. Today, at 100,000 I don't know what I feel, it's unreal for this journey has taught me so many things, that now 100k is a testament of just one thing-

Consistency. That's what this is all about.


If you wake up every single day & put your head down and keep doing, magic comes by.


I smiled, like I do only because I'm happy for the Koustubh in January 2022, who would have lost his mind over this & I'm so glad this happened but for now, I'm looking for more smiles, growth & curiosities.


I'm forever grateful & this one is for all of you. RCs dare to dream big & don't be afraid to fail.


I'm with you, I always will be.


- With love, Koustubh

6 days 5 Townhalls in Pune ‚õ∫


The last time I went back home was in November of 2021, it was Diwali.


  • Going home after 9 months! & I can't wait to show you all my home & the iconic KK's poster wall. My home is where the creator in me took form!
  • SCF kicked off in January & this is the first time I'll be going home after launching SCFüòÑ
  • Finally will make cards from my house turf now!


My moment ‚ù§



Going back as a pathfinder to my collegeüòÅ


Didn't think in just 1 year of graduating I'll be going back like this. Too happy and excited to meet my teachers & walk in the same corridors where I started my journey with Under 25.


Tanisha & I started building Under 25 MIT WPU together in 2019. We never thought of anything more than just building a community of hungry people on our campus & today we have another chance to inspire the next gen of rock stars!


If I can do it so can you! Keep hustling & Magical things come by! ‚ù§

Surprise Creator Camp in Pune! üèï


Creator Camps have only happened in Bangalore so far. As I'm on a college tour I thought of setting up a surprise creator camp for Pune Resident Creatorsü¶ã



Core Memory ‚ù£


Meeting Resident Creators out of Bangalore felt like meeting your online friends when college reopens! We shot videos, laughed, spoke for hours & most importantly felt like we belonged here



RCs you have my heart & I want to come to everyone's city to come & just give you all a hug! Trust me that's the best feeling ever!


Pune RCs have my heart üíò


Devyani, Jyoti, Maamu, Mahima, Mansi, Pragati, Sahil, Samruddhi, Sayujyata, Shrishti, Surbhi, Vaishnavi & Vishakha thank you gifting me this experience üåª


(Got all your names correct in one go this timeü•∞)

Card Description: Sneak peak in what the HQ looks like today! üé¨
Card Body: Walk through of HQ!

As the Under 25 app is going public here are some things that all of you should be aware of:


1. Activation Code üéü

All Explorers including you will be getting a unique activation code that will give you access to the latest version of the app.


2. Retention in the fellowship üìë

  • RCs who've not participated in more than 1 mission & are not part of any sessions shall be released from the fellowship.
  • If you've not checked the app in the last 30 days & there is no communication with you about the same then you shall be released from the Under 25 App.


3. Space Chat üìÆ

  • I wanted to also drop in to let you know on a very important aspect of the new update.
  • If you're part of a closed space, you automatically get added to a communication feature - the "Space Chat" which includes all the members of that particular space.
  • In the upcoming release, we are removing space chat as a concept as they get spammy and hence we are limiting group sizes to 95 explorers per group.


What does this mean for you? üè∑

You will now be added to a group separately wherein you can still interact with the members of your space, but this would be a limited set of members instead.


In our case there will be 2 sub groups:

  1. Student Creator Fellowship | Inferno ‚òÑ
  2. Student Creator Fellowship | Aqua üåä


4. Original Creators üèÅ

  • OCs who've been consistently telling stories & expressing by publishing cards will be retained. OCs who've not been consistent in the last 30 days will be debadged & will again get a chance to earn the badge in the coming months.
  • RCs who've gained trust through delivery will be badged as OCs!


Taking doubts in the comments! Also are you ready to roll with the new beginning? üöÄ

History of OCs üì∑

It's been over 2 months since we've had Original Creators on the platform.


Present of OCs üì∏

  • Only RCs who've been publishing regularly in the last 30 days were retained.
  • Due to lack of pro activeness we'll be moving forward with only 53 OCs & release the rest.
  • 3 RCs who have been consistent are getting newly badged!
  • 2 Gamers are also getting badged as OCs!



Future of OCs üéØ

RCs + new explorers who will tell stories regularly & will bring in their energy on the feed,will stand a chance to get badged again.


Final round up üé≤


üíΩ Retented OCs - 48

üíø Released OCs - 46

üìÄ New additions to OCs - 5 (3 RCs & 2 OGs)

üíæ Total Number of OCs now - 53


Final Roster of Under 25 Orignal Creators


All the best team! Let's start taking over the universe feed again, shall we? üéø

Even before we announce mission 11 we have closed mission 12 too!


Today Arihant & I had a great meeting with a brand & soon we'll be unlocking mad money for the student walletüí∏



Can you guess which brand is this?ü§≠

Card Description: Limited intake only 25 spotsüö®
Card Body:
Fairtrade's work is guided by a global strategy focused on ensuring that all farmers earn a living income, and agricultural workers earn a living wage. Fairtrade works with farmers and workers of more than 300 commodities. The main products promoted under the Fairtrade label are coffee, flowers, tea, chikki and sugar.


#FairFootprint


We‚Äôve always thought about how green our footprint is. It is time to think about how fair it is too. We often only think about immediate results and rewards, but it is our consistent sustained actions that will build a fairer world.


Fairtrade India invites you to be Fair & Green and support the campaign from wherever you are. It is time for you to start identifying yourself as a fair person.

  • How will others know that you are fair?
  • Well we‚Äôve thought of an easy simple way in which we can identify all those around us who are trying to take steps towards a #FairFuture.
  • Those who are committed to leave a #FairFootprint on this planet.


What is a Fair & Green Footprint? üåà

We need to be mindful of the impact our everyday food and fashion choices have on farming communities.



Do a reel for not more than 1 minute where you have to stand in nature with a clean and green background & a static post.

Deliverablesüî•:

  1. 1 reel
  2. 1 static post


It can be your backyard, your school lawn, the garden in your apartment complex or anywhere with a nice background and talk about the green footprint, show your support to the cause by showing the products and then take a pledge to support the cause in your static post.




Reelsüì¢

Start with: Including all these call outs (pick minimum 4)

  • ‚ÄúWe need to be mindful of the impact our everyday food and fashion choices have on farmers‚Äù ü•¨
  • ‚ÄúIt is our consistent sustained actions that will build a fairer world‚Äù (Mandatory call out)


Hold that product, bite into a Fairtrade chocolate showcase your socks with flowers in it. üßá

(Shoot a boomerang of you doing all 3 thing together, Take a live photo and convert it into a boomerang)


  • ‚ÄúBe consistent.‚Äù
  • ‚ÄúThink of every step you take.‚Äù
  • ‚ÄúSo take a pledge with me to build a fairer world! And Follow Fairtrade!‚Äù


Static Postüßæ: Pledge

  1. Pledge Caption Content: I pledge to be more¬†mindful¬†and¬†conscious¬†of the¬†social and¬†environmental impact¬†of my choices. I support the¬†Fairtrademovement. #FairtradePledge#SwitchToSCP.
  2. Make sure youre amidst nature and are taking a static photo of yourself with a fairtrade product.


CTA For all Posts: Leave a fair foot print & follow Fair Trade



#FairFootprint

#FairFuture

#SwitchToSCP

#FairtradexSCF

#StudentCreatorFellowship


Tags

@fairtrade.india

@under25official

2500 for reel + static post üí∞

Card Description: Best Work gets match tickets to T20 World Cup in Australia!
Card Body:
Eatfit delivers fresh, tasty meals that are wholesome but most importantly super healthy. eatfit offers you not only a nutritious, preservative-free meal, but also a variety of cuisines to choose from, and menus that change regularly.


Each dish is filled with quality ingredients, packed with flavor, and has nutritional information sitting atop it; to remind you that healthy eating can be enjoyable.



#UpgradetoEatfit can work towards becoming the biggest movement that calls out to all student problems regarding healthy consumption habits and is activating and educating the youth on how they can solve for it by upgrading to Eatfit as their go to solution for all food cravings.


Deliverables:

Download the EatFit app

Card Description: First Contract deal for RCs! Biggest monetary unlock till nowüí∞üí∞
Card Body:
Snapdragon, Unleash your Dreams is a 6-month campaign where the goal is to build a Snapdragon Insider community and establish the brand in the field of photo, video and music. However RCs will be playing smaller roles in the entire 6 months campaignü§åüèª


We achieve this by running contests in the 3 fields, where the winners of the contests walk away with internships and workshops from our mentors.


Create Content promoting sign-ups for the photography competition.

The influencer content‚Äôs sole purpose is to drive traffic to Snapdragon India‚Äôs Instagram handle (snapdragon_in) and push viewers to follow the page and in turn become a Snapdragon Insider.


Who will be the judges of this competition?

  1. 1 static post
  2. 1 story
  3. 1 reel (not more than 45 seconds)



  • We have partnered with Snapdragon to bring you an opportunity of a lifetime üëü
  • Talk about Snapdragon as a brand, associating Snapdragon as the best in class processor for photography, videography and music.
  • It is an opportunity where you stand a chance to get mentored by the best names in the industry (Dabboo Ratnani, Aarzoo Khuranna, Atul Kasbekar).
  • Win a chance to attend a workshop by Aarzoo Khurana and an internship with Aarzoo Khurana and Dabboo Ratnani.


Final CTA:

  • Follow @Snapdragon_in
  • Sign up/Follow to become a Snapdragon Insider!
  • Register for the Snapshot contest and participate now!


While keeping the above-mentioned content in mind, Influencers are free to use their own style and imagination which they believe is the best way to drive as many viewers to follow Snapdragon‚Äôs Instagram page and register for the contest.



  1. When showcasing any mobile phone or its interface in the content, only use OnePlus mobile phones that are powered by Snapdragon or phones that are powered by Snapdragon processors.
  2. Do not use desktop or any other mobile phone in your content while showcasing tutorials, hacks,etc.
  3. Influencers will have to follow the Snapdragon page and become a Snapdragon Insider before sharing the content.
  4. Do not use or showcase any DSLR cameras in the content. Kindly stick to content that is shot and edited on mobile phones.
  5. Do not include any logos of third-party applications, or software in the content.


  • Limited Intake - 75 Creators! (15 Explorers from Universe)
  • Timelines are strict.
  • Reels to be under 45 seconds
  • You can be creative if you want to or directly call out using beats on a trending audio.
  • For static post use only snapdragon processor phones in picture.
  • Unleash your dreams is a theme so look excited for the competition
  • Tag the same accounts and mention details about this competition in the caption in a neat manner.


### Timelines: Do all 3 deliverables within the same timelines.

29th October - 10th November

#Under25DayOOTD

Hey! Caught your attention right? Read till the end to know why this is the first sentence on this card.


I've been living & breathing with so many incredible creators for the last 3 months at the Student Creator Fellowship that I‚Äôve found an insight that can potentially help all explorers/Creators on the app.


All creators love to flex their work & why shouldn't they? After all, there is so much effort put into every single piece of content that goes up! From the storytelling to searching for the right audio to even putting the right caption.


Every. Small. Thing. MATTERS!


It really breaks my heart to see a creator not get the reach/ attention they deserve or see their links get lost in space chat.


Here's my request!üß©

A way that helps you drive a better storyline to every piece of content you do & also gets you more eyeballs than ever!


We replace video links with Universe Cards & make the space chat link free!


You can now drive a better narrative by adding context/ Visuals and leave explorers with a hook/ a sneak peek that makes them feel like watching your/ viewing that picture/ reading a specific article.


Everyone will know what they‚Äôre clicking on before they do.

Odysseus and Penelope



Odysseus was the king of Ithaca, who went to fight in the Trojan Wars, leaving behind his wife, Penelope, and their young son Telemachus.


The couple had been very loving, and while she waited for his return, Penelope remained faithful and true. Because Odysseus took twenty years to return, many young men assumed he was dead and crowded Penelope at the palace as her suitors, trying to convince or force her to marry one of them.


But, like Odysseus, Penelope was cunning, and she devised several tricks and ruses to keep them from forcing her hand and to protect her son from getting killed. When Odysseus returned, he killed the suitors and regained his throne, which Penelope had preserved for him.

Are you ready?

Who Is The Super Team? üåü

Super team is a collective of the most promising explorers of the universe & are coined as the first believers of Under 25.


Why is The Super Team being created? üåª

Super team is the summoning of doers that start the educational revolution from the grass root levels. They spread awareness & connect the students of the world to the Under 25 vision.

Who can be a part of the Super Team? ‚ù§

Hungry explorers who believe in Under 25 & are ready to work towards building a generation.


How long is the Super Team Quest? üì≥

25 days


How much time will I have to commit as being a part of the Super Team? üòå

As much as you'd like to, no compulsion.


What expectations do you have from me as a Super Team Explorer? ‚è∞

  • Talk to every curious mind out there
  • Get your college/City aware about the education revolution.
  • Network with colleges and students in your state, and talk to them about the education revolution
  • Be the best team player
  • Ideate on projects and campaigns with artists at Under 25.
  • To be a student at the core of everything you do
  • Practice non violent communication
  • To do small things with great love


What will I get for being a Super Team Explorer? üß∞

  • Work with the artist of Under 25 hands on.
  • Top 10 students who slammed it get celebrated on billboards across the country.
  • Exclusive Under 25 Lifestyle
  • Direct Under 25 Deals


How can I be a part of the super team? üöÄ

Apply here


Fire up the comments once you applied!/ if you have any doubts we shall get back to you tooüåª

Announcement! ü•Å

Starting this Wednesday we are flagging off student takeovers on Under 25 Offical!


  • Selected Students get a chance to take over the page for a day & get the spotlight on them.


  • The Explorer with the top card of the day gets this opportunity.
  • Posting time to avail this unlock (10 AM - 7 PM)
